verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Holy, holy,
holy, holy Lord.
holy, holy Lord.
God of host,
holy, holy Lord. x2

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Heaven and earth,
are filled with your glory.
(Hosanna in highest,
hosanna in the highest,
hosanna in the highest,
hosanna in the highest,
hosanna in the highest). x2

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Blessed is he,
who comes in the Lord's name.
(Hosanna in highest,
hosanna in the highest,
hosanna in the highest,
hosanna in the highest,
hosanna in the highest). x2
